page.title: 10BERRYPICKING
page.content: During July and August it is possible to earn some money from "berrypicking" ,usually raspberries, or sometimes strawberries. You must begin early in the morning, take a packed lunch and a piece of string to tie the fruit baskets around your waist. At the field you must begin work immediately. Picking berries is hard work under a hot sun but it's worth it, and at twelve pence a basket it is possible to earn up to Â£10 a day depending on how fast you pick, and how big the crop is. The berries are transported to Forfar, Montrose or Dundee to be canned, frozen or made into jam."PICK YOUR OWN" is also possible.
